title: transfering from NA to Oceanic
body: Ive been trying to transfer my account from North America to Oceanic to be with my other account but when i check the Account section of the shop it only lists change summoner name. Is there a level requirement or something to be able to transfer? can any1 shed some light.

replies.body: Ah you may need to reach lvl 5 to lvl 15 or so. I had a friend who couldn't transfer. If it's not by lvls then I'm then going to guess you need a few wins/games before transferring to OCE.
I think that your name in NA has already been used in OCE. That might mean you are in "Need" of requiring a name change. At least yo get it for free. (If this really is the case)
